niwasaka wasthu dosha athiwana ha athiwiya haki awastha 1)niwasa pihiti bhumiye hadaya,pihitima nisa athiwana dosha 2)bhumiya aashitha bahirawa,bhutha,anawina,kodiwina wani dosha 3)idame pada bedimedi(brahma,dewa,manusha,pretha) sudusu padaye niwasa sadima magaharimen athiwana dosha 4)salasuma nirmanayedi athiwiya haki dosha(salasum nirmana karu wisin niwase salasuma nirmanaya kirimedi gehimiyata,bhumiyata sudusu ayurin nokirima ha aththiwaramata pada bedimedi,kamara wen kirimedi,dora uluwahu lakunu kirimedi ha salasume wenath awasthawaladi marmasthana magaharima nisilesa sidu nowima) 5)salasuma dosha rahithawa athath mesan,waduwan wisin salasuma nisilesa kriyathmaka nokaramin lanu adimedi,biththi badimedi,uluwahu janel thabimedi,wahala gasimedi nodanuwathkamin (ho uwamanawenma) dosha athiwana paridi wada katayuthu kirima nisa athiwana dosha 6)niwasa sada pasukalinawa sidukerena awidhimath wenas kirim,asalwasi niwes idikirim wenas kirim,parisaraye gahakola pihitim aadiye siduwana wenas wim nisa athiwana desha ihatha dakwana lada dosha pilibadawa thawaduratath salaka balamu. 1)bhumiye hadaya pihitima nisa athiwana dosha(mema hadathala diswima mehi dakwa athi aakarayatama nathi wuwath hoda purudu karayekuta idame hadaya kumakdayi dutu pamaninma wataha gatha haka.)
